description: Summarize the previous term! (in increasing order).
comments: a(n) = 21322314 for n > 12. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 25 2014The digits of each term a(n) are a permutation of those of the corresponding term A063850(n). - _Chayim Lowen_, Jul 16 2015

example: The term after 312213 is obtained by saying "Two 1's, two 2's, two 3's", which gives 21-22-23, i.e., 212223.
